document_data.name: Chourm Mristar
document_data.titles: Sister{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of the Tempest|25}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Chourm Mristar''' was a monk from the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]] in [[Damara]] in the late 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationship: Chourm was a good friend of [[Lana]], and was one of the people that Lana trusted most.
document_data.Activities: Chourm lived in the village of [[Tomrav]], acting as the monastery's envoy.
